name: Bluegrass First Steps
description: Kentucky's Early Intervention System serving children from birth to age 3 with developmental delays or medical conditions known to cause delays. Provides comprehensive early intervention services including developmental assessments, therapy services, family support, and coordination with community resources. Part of the statewide First Steps program administered by the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
source: Verified from official Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services website and multiple authoritative sources
eligibility: Children from birth to age 3 with developmental delays or medical conditions known to cause delays
services: Early intervention services, developmental assessments, therapy services, family support, service coordination
notes: Statewide hotline: (877) 417-8377. Anyone can refer a child for First Steps services. Services are provided in the child's natural environment (home, daycare, etc.).
